DOC.brief_summary: The goal study evaluate effect three weight management intervention ( group phone conference call , individual phone call , enhance usual care ) weight across 18 month overweight obese adult recruit treated rural primary care clinic .
DOC.detailed_description: The rate overweight/obesity significantly high among resident rural area compare urban counterpart . Recent focus provide whole-person health care suggest rural primary care clinic may provide ideal set delivery weight management . This study 3 group randomize trial evaluate intervention delivery . The investigator randomize 200 overweight/obese adult resident rural town ( town population < 50,000 ) obtain health care primary care clinic one three group 18 month trial ( 6 month weight loss ; 12 month weight maintenance ) . Group 1 ) Group phone ( GP ) /Portion-Controlled Meals ( PCM ) Group 2 ) Individual phone ( IP ) /PCM Group 3 ) Enhanced usual care ( EUC ) /Conventional Diet ( CD ) All participant receive progressive physical activity program . Physical activity progress 45 min/wk month 1 300 min/wk month 4 remain 300 min/wk duration 18 month study Group 1 & 2 . Physical activity progress 45 min/wk month 1 150 min/wk month 4 remain 150 min/wk duration 18 month study Group 3 . Participants CD ask consume nutritionally balance , reduce energy , high volume , low fat ( fat= 20-30 % energy ) diet recommend Academy Nutrition Dietetics USDA 's MyPlate approach . Examples meal plan consist suggest serving protein , grain , fruit vegetable , dairy fat base individual energy need provide . Participants use PCM consume PCMs addition 5 fruit vegetable per day weight loss . EUC meet health educator every 6 month discuss weight management topic . GP & IP receive weight management intervention phone weekly weight loss biweekly weight maintenance track diet physical activity submit result health educator prior every meeting .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index 25 45 kg/m2 Clearance primary care physician Unable participate moderate intensity physical activity Participation weight loss physical activity program previous 6 month Greater 3 , 30min bout plan exercise/week Not weight stable ( +/4.6 kg ) 3 month prior intake Unwilling randomize 1 3 study group Report pregnant previous 6 month plan pregnancy follow 18 month Serious medical risk cancer , recent cardiac event Current use antipsychotic untreated depression Adherence specialize diet regimen ( food allergy , vegetarian , macrobiotic ) Binge eat disorder Living household another study participant Planning movie location longer access rural clinic site
